mapper.select: select b.User_name as username, b.User_tele as usertele, c.area_name as areaname, d.City_name as cityname, (case b.user_level when 1 then '一级用户' when 2 then '二级用户' when 3 then '三级用户' when 4 then '四级用户' end ) as levelname, g.Type_name as typename, b.User_company as usercompany, a.Tx_id as txid, f.Charge as charge, f.Getting_now as gettingnow, f.Get_now as getnow, f.All_geting as allgeting, e.Bank_account as bankaccount, e.Bank_name as bankname, e.Bank_open as bankopen, e.Bank_cardid as bankcardid, a.Fee as fee, a.state as state, (case a.state when 0 then '提现申请中' when 1 then '审核通过，待打款' when 2 then '审核驳回' when 3 then '已打款' when 4 then '打款失败' when 5 then '用户已确认' when 6 then '自动确认' end ) as statename, a.Add_date as adddate, a.state as state, a.Bz as bz from tower_user_tx_record a, tower_user_info b left join tower_user_type g on b.User_type = g.ID, tower_area c, tower_city d, tower_user_bank e, tower_user_charge f where a.Wx_id = b.Wx_id and b.User_area = c.ID and d.City_id = c.City_id and a.Card_id = e.id and a.Wx_id = f.Wx_id and a.ID =#{txid};

select f.Order_id as orderid, e.Tower_id as towerid, e.Tower_name as towername, c.area_name as areaname, d.City_name as cityname, a.Fee as fee, (case a.Fee_type when 0 then '预付款' when 1 then '尾款' end ) as feetypename, a.Pay_time as paytime from tower_user_tx_source a, tower_user_info b, tower_area c, tower_city d, tower_tower_info e, tower_order_detail f where a.Wx_id = b.Wx_id and e.tower_area = c.ID and d.City_id = c.City_id and a.Order_id = f.ID and f.Tower_id = e.ID and a.Tx_id = #{txid};

select Do_user_name as dousername, Do_user_tele as dousertele, (case User_type when 0 then '用户' when 1 then '管理员' end ) as usertypename, (case Now_state when 0 then '提现申请中' when 1 then '审核通过，待打款' when 2 then '审核驳回' when 3 then '已打款' when 4 then '打款失败' when 5 then '用户已确认' when 6 then '自动确认' end) as nowstatename, Do_date as dodate, Sh_info as shinfo from tower_user_tx_doinfo where Tx_id = #{txid};
mapper.update: update tower_user_tx_record set state = #{state}, bank_back_id= #{bankbackid} , Complete_date=GETDATE() where Tx_id = #{txid};
mapper.select: select e.Bank_cardid as bankcardid, a.Fee as fee, a.Wx_id as wxid from tower_user_tx_record a left join tower_user_bank e on e.id=a.Card_id where 1=1 and a.Tx_id =#{txid};
